name: part_008
file: tmp_【#超ゲマズ2_day1】hololive GAMERS fes. 超超超超ゲーマーズ2【チラ見せ】 [DsZz2bIg-Ho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio finishes her greeting, expressing her happiness that the four members of hololive Gamers could gather for the event.
Nekomata Okayu gives her greeting, mentioning it's Shohei Ohtani's birthday and setting a goal for her 'Gag Batting Average'.
Inugami Korone gives her greeting, making jokes about delivering a gift to her fans.
Shirakami Fubuki gives her greeting, mentioning her heavy script load and asking for audience support.
The members provide information about the ABEMA PPV live stream, archive availability, and purchase bonuses.
The members announce event goods pre-orders and show off special limited items like the acrylic panel.
Fubuki introduces a collaboration with NTT Docomo's 'home 5G' while trying to manage the other rowdy members.

subtitles.original: んですけど、今年は4人でね、
subtitles.english: ...but since the four of us

subtitles.original: 無事に開催することができたので、
subtitles.english: were able to safely hold this together this year,

subtitles.original: 明日も無事に終えられるように、
subtitles.english: so that we can finish tomorrow safely as well,

subtitles.original: 体調管理だけはしっかりして、
subtitles.english: I'll take good care of my health,

subtitles.original: 2日間過ごしたいと思いまーす！
subtitles.english: and I want to spend these two days together!

subtitles.original: 頑張るぞー！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: ではでは、
subtitles.english: Well then,

subtitles.original: 続いては、
subtitles.english: next up is

subtitles.original: おかゆ！
subtitles.english: Okayu!

subtitles.original: まぁ僕はね、去年に引き続きの参加となるんですが、
subtitles.english: Well, I'm participating again after last year,

subtitles.original: まぁ今日はね、大谷翔平の誕生日ということで！
subtitles.english: well, today is Shohei Ohtani's birthday!

subtitles.original: 大谷関係ないやろ！
subtitles.english: Ohtani has nothing to do with this!

subtitles.original: すごい人だけどさ、
subtitles.english: He's an amazing person, but...

subtitles.original: ギャグ打率3割！
subtitles.english: a Gag Batting Average of .300!

subtitles.original: 目指して頑張りたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best to aim for that!

subtitles.original: ちょっと当ててください。
subtitles.english: Please cheer for me a bit.

subtitles.original: おかゆならもっといけそうだけどな。
subtitles.english: Okayu seems like she could go higher though.

subtitles.original: そして！
subtitles.english: And!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、翔平に素敵なプレゼントを、
subtitles.english: Today, so that I can deliver a wonderful gift...

subtitles.original: 届けられるように、
subtitles.english: to Shohei,

subtitles.original: こーはなりよー！
subtitles.english: Ko-ha-na-ri-yo!

subtitles.original: せめて「ころスキ」に届けてくれ。
subtitles.english: At least deliver it to "Koro-Suki".

subtitles.original: あ、ころスキに届けます！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll deliver it to Koro-Suki!

subtitles.original: そしてそして！
subtitles.english: And and!

subtitles.original: 白上はですね、皆さま、昨年に引き続きまして、
subtitles.english: As for me, everyone, continuing from last year,

subtitles.original: なんとあの台本の8割を白上が読み上げるということで！
subtitles.english: Shirakami will be reading about 80% of the script!

subtitles.original: 全力で、喉をいたわりつつ、
subtitles.english: I'll take care of my throat with all my might,

subtitles.original: 台本は白上だらけな。
subtitles.english: the script is full of Shirakami.

subtitles.original: なので喉が枯れ始めたら、「あ、頑張ってるな」と思って、
subtitles.english: so if my voice starts getting hoarse, please think "Ah, she's working hard",

subtitles.original: いっぱいペンライト振ってください！
subtitles.english: and wave your light sticks a lot!

subtitles.original: お前らの声に負けねーから、よろしく！
subtitles.english: I won't lose to your voices, so look forward to it!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、今日と明日行われる「超超超超ゲーマーズ2」は、
subtitles.english: Also, "Chou Chou Chou Chou Gamers 2" held today and tomorrow

subtitles.original: ABEMA PPVで生配信してます！
subtitles.english: is being live-streamed on ABEMA PPV!

subtitles.original: 見てるー？
subtitles.english: Are you watching?

subtitles.original: 見てらー？
subtitles.english: Are you watching?

subtitles.original: コメントも我々見えておりますよ。
subtitles.english: We can see your comments as well.

subtitles.original: ねえ、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: こちら配信チケットは絶賛発売中です。
subtitles.english: Streaming tickets are now on sale.

subtitles.original: イベントが終わっても、8月4日月曜日の23時59分まで、
subtitles.english: Even after the event, until 23:59 on Monday, August 4th,

subtitles.original: 何度でも見返すことができまーす！
subtitles.english: you can watch it as many times as you like!

subtitles.original: 購入特典としましては、Day 1とDay 2で異なるシチュエーションの、
subtitles.english: As a purchase bonus, for Day 1 and Day 2, there are different situations of

subtitles.original: 限定オリジナルボイスドラマがついてきます。
subtitles.english: limited original voice dramas included.

subtitles.original: Day 1は「秘密の事前プロデュースボイス」。
subtitles.english: Day 1 is "Secret Advance Produce Voice".

subtitles.original: これエッチなやつかな？
subtitles.english: Is this an ecchi one?

subtitles.original: 違います。
subtitles.english: No.

subtitles.original: そしてDay 2は、「内緒の超ヒマズお疲れ様ボイス」。
subtitles.english: And Day 2 is "Secret Super After-Gamer-Otsukare Voice".

subtitles.original: これエッチなやつかな？
subtitles.english: Is this an ecchi one?

subtitles.original: やめな！
subtitles.english: Stop it!

subtitles.original: こちらの2つボイス、エッチじゃないです。聴いてください。
subtitles.english: These two voices are not ecchi. Please listen to them.

subtitles.original: あとはですね、我々の直筆メッセージ入りのライブ画像も、
subtitles.english: Also, live photos with our handwritten messages

subtitles.original: ついてきますので、ぜひチェックしてください！
subtitles.english: will be included, so please check it out!

subtitles.original: さらに！昨年行われました「超超超超ゲーマーズ」の、
subtitles.english: Furthermore! The "Chou Chou Chou Chou Gamers" held last year,

subtitles.original: ダイジェストがABEMAプレミアムで公開中です！
subtitles.english: the digest is now available on ABEMA Premium!

subtitles.original: 昨年のもね、めちゃめちゃ面白かったのでぜひとも見てください。
subtitles.english: Last year's was also very interesting, so please take a look.

subtitles.original: さらにさらに！イベント後にグッズの受注販売が開始します！
subtitles.english: Furthermore! Goods pre-orders will start after the event!

subtitles.original: ありがたいことにDay 1のグッズがなんか完売らしくて、
subtitles.english: Gratefully, it seems the Day 1 goods are sold out,

subtitles.original: 皆さんありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: こちらグッズの受注販売の期間が、本日の朝10時から、
subtitles.english: The pre-order period for these goods is from 10:00 this morning,

subtitles.original: 7月21日の23時59分まで、
subtitles.english: until 23:59 on July 21st,

subtitles.original: Cyber Goods Storeにて受付中でございます。
subtitles.english: available at the Cyber Goods Store.

subtitles.original: こちらのグッズ、9月下旬までにはお届け予定とのことです。
subtitles.english: These goods are scheduled to be delivered by late September.

subtitles.original: そしてなんと！事後限定グッズとしまして、
subtitles.english: And wow! As post-event limited goods,

subtitles.original: アクリルパネルが追加されます！
subtitles.english: an acrylic panel will be added!

subtitles.original: イベント限定グッズが手に入る最後のチャンスなので、
subtitles.english: This is your last chance to get event-limited goods,

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひこちらチェックしてください！
subtitles.english: so please definitely check it out!

subtitles.original: 今の話を、大人しく聞けない生徒みたいになってます。
subtitles.english: They've become like students who won't listen quietly.

subtitles.original: はい、先生話すからねー。
subtitles.english: Yes, Teacher is talking now.

subtitles.original: さらにさらに！もうご存知の方もいらっしゃると思いますが、
subtitles.english: Furthermore! I think some of you may already know,

subtitles.original: NTTドコモさんの「home 5G」とのコラボが実施いたしましたー！
subtitles.english: a collaboration with NTT Docomo's "home 5G" has been implemented!

subtitles.original: 先生の話は聞かなくてもいいけど、声は出さないで！
subtitles.english: You don't have to listen to Teacher, but don't make any noise!

subtitles.original: すみませんでしたー。
subtitles.english: We are sorry.

subtitles.original: 今、NTTドコモさんのご紹介してたでしょう？
subtitles.english: I was just introducing NTT Docomo, wasn't I?

subtitles.original: 友達！
subtitles.english: Friends!

subtitles.original: 友達か！
subtitles.english: Are we friends?!

subtitles.original: では、どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Well, go ahead!
